relation: Harper has a full police building with lots of friendly officers that take their job seriously and makes it a main priority to keep the campus safe.

The cost for attending school here is very reasonable and affordable. They are always thinking of ways to keep it affordable while also making sure you are staying interested with fun campus activities. Its the best investment I've ever made!

Harper College is five minutes away from some of Chicago's' biggest attractions. Wood-field Mall, which is one of the largest malls in the country, is only a few minutes away. The movie theater and lots of other shopping centers is also right around the area. For the most part, people on campus are very friendly so making friends and having fun with them should never be a problem.

The food here is great! There is something freshly cooked every day at a pretty reasonable price. There are about five cafeterias and plenty vending machines all around campus so picking up a good snack is always very convenient
Harper doesn't have dorms but there are a lot of apartments very close in range.

For the most part, the staff at Harper College is very great and their way of teaching is even better. Even if you don't agree with the teachers style of teaching, there are great free tutoring centers where you can actually get one on one help.

If I could give tips to any prospective student, it would be to simply make the most out it. There is so much the school has to offer and so much to get involved in. There are countless numbers of clubs and always some type of activity going on. Just stay focused, get involved and you'll will be sure to enjoy your time here.

Harper College is a very diverse school that is great on helping students succeed in what ever it is they're trying to accomplish. They have great staff and plenty of free tutoring centers. If you're looking for a great affordable college education, Harper is the place to go!

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students register early so your able to make the schuedele you want! Bang for the buck If you want to save a ton of money, and get a great education harper is ranked one of the best community colleges, if like me you fall in love with the school but dont live in the district, many people dont know that you can also work in the district part time and still get the discount which is pretty amazing! Am enjoying being here Im trying to get into advertising and im taking my gen eds at harper, what truely got my attention was the design Harper has amazing Architeture and a garden in the middle of all their buildings. Which in the summer is filled with amazing flowers and green grass and has water fountians, and ponds. The atmposhere is unique. As well at the instructors are able to be flexible with their learning techinques, and aid in any subject is avaiable , I was relieved to find out they had a math help lab and 4 current teachers at harper were always their aiding students.
